headline: Michael Saylor calls for $13 million BTC — Pantera CEO says $745K is ‘realistic’
summary: Dan Morehead backs Bitcoin’s staying power, citing mass adoption and $15T market cap potential amid rising institutional support.

raw.headline: Michael Saylor calls for $13 million BTC — Pantera CEO says $745K is ‘realistic’
raw.summary: Dan Morehead backs Bitcoin’s staying power, citing mass adoption and $15T market cap potential amid rising institutional support.

headline: Energy regulator grants BlackRock renewed authorization for large utility investments
summary: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission gave the nation’s largest asset manager to continue to acquire up to 20% of voting securities for utility companies for another three years.

raw.headline: Energy regulator grants BlackRock renewed authorization for large utility investments
raw.summary: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission gave the nation’s largest asset manager to continue to acquire up to 20% of voting securities for utility companies for another three years.

headline: Why the 60/40 retirement portfolio needs a revamp
summary: The traditional retirement account of stocks and bonds may need a tweak as global capital markets and investing evolve, according to BlackRock CEO Larry Fink and others.

raw.headline: Why the 60/40 retirement portfolio needs a revamp
raw.summary: The traditional retirement account of stocks and bonds may need a tweak as global capital markets and investing evolve, according to BlackRock CEO Larry Fink and others.
